page.title: 13TOURIST ACCOMMODATION
page.content: WE INTERVEIWED A GUEST HOUSE MANAGER ALONG THE SEAFRONT.THE GUEST HOUSE MANAGER SAID HE LIKED RUNNING A GUEST HOUSE MAINLY BECAUSE YOU MEET A LOT OF DIFFERENT PEOPLE.THE GUEST HOUSE IS OPEN ALL YEAR,BUT THE HOLIDAY SEASON IS SIX MONTHS.THE GUESTS ALL COME FROM AROUND THE SAME PLACE,BUT THEY DO GET SOME CONTINENTAL VISITORS FOR SHORT STAYS.THE GUEST HOUSE IS ADVERTISED IN THE THANET GUIDE AND FOR THE FIRST TIME THIS YEAR THEY ADVERTISED IN A SCOTTISH NEWSPAPER. 60% OF THE GUESTS RETURN EVERY YEAR.THEY ALL COME FROM ESSEX,LONDON AND HOME COUNTIES.THERE ARE 29 HOTELS IN OUR 12 GRID SQUARES.THERE ARE 55 GUEST HOUSES AND 27 BED AND BREAKFAST.
